forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning scattered snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few snow showers likely changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
